articles.author: Stephen Neukam
articles.title: Schumer defends Zohran Mamdani from "disgusting" GOP attacks - Axios
articles.description: Mamdani, born in Uganda, became a naturalized American citizen in 2018.
articles.content:
• Rep. Andy Ogles (R-Tenn.) urged Attorney General Pam Bondi in a letter this week to open an investigation into whether Mamdani should be subject to denaturalization proceedings.
